Title: Fix compile blockers and critical warnings
Description: Resolve build blockers and reduce critical warning surface
Acceptance Criteria: CI build passes for target frameworks

Title: Standardize structured logging and error codes
Description: Implement consistent logging and typed error codes across pipeline stages
Acceptance Criteria: All stages emit structured logs and actionable error codes

Title: Enforce CI quality gates
Description: Add merge blocking checks for build tests and fixture smoke
Acceptance Criteria: PRs fail on gate violations

Title: Remove non-determinism from artifacts
Description: Normalize ordering and timestamps in generated outputs
Acceptance Criteria: Repeated runs on same input produce same artifacts

Title: Finalize canonical schema and version marker
Description: Define versioned canonical rule model and schema contract
Acceptance Criteria: Schema document and version marker are published

Title: Add strict boundary validators
Description: Validate canonical payloads at import storage and export boundaries
Acceptance Criteria: Invalid payloads fail fast with clear diagnostics

Title: Create schema migration scaffold
Description: Add migration interfaces and baseline migration test path
Acceptance Criteria: Migration harness exists with passing baseline tests

Title: Build canonical fixture suite
Description: Create golden fixtures for canonical contract behaviors
Acceptance Criteria: Golden fixture suite passes in CI

Title: Harden STIG/XCCDF adapter
Description: Improve parsing and extract classification metadata into canonical fields
Acceptance Criteria: Classification extraction tests pass

Title: Complete SCAP adapter with OVAL retention
Description: Preserve and map OVAL references without silent data loss
Acceptance Criteria: SCAP fixtures retain OVAL references end to end

Title: Normalize GPO/ADMX adapter
Description: Apply deterministic defaults and compatibility handling for GPO metadata
Acceptance Criteria: GPO adapter fixtures pass with deterministic output

Title: Add PowerSTIG mapping validation
Description: Implement traceability checks for mapped and unmapped controls
Acceptance Criteria: Mapping report lists coverage and gaps

Title: Generate compatibility matrix report
Description: Produce CI artifact describing supported lossy and unsupported mappings
Acceptance Criteria: Compatibility matrix is generated on CI runs

Title: Detect identity conflicts
Description: Detect duplicate or contradictory control identity records during integration
Acceptance Criteria: Conflicts are surfaced with severity and policy action

Title: Add atomic writes and recovery checkpoints
Description: Implement crash safe writes and resumable integration checkpoints
Acceptance Criteria: Interrupted runs recover without corruption

Title: Add round trip integration tests
Description: Test supported import export combinations and document expected lossy fields
Acceptance Criteria: Round trip suite passes with explicit known diffs

Title: Finalize apply fallbacks and idempotency
Description: Complete apply fallback paths and enforce idempotent execution behavior
Acceptance Criteria: Repeat apply does not create unintended changes

Title: Unify verify outputs
Description: Normalize SCAP Evaluate-STIG and CKL outputs into one report model
Acceptance Criteria: Unified verify report is generated with source traceability

Title: Complete eMASS package outputs
Description: Implement required indexes hash manifests and submission docs
Acceptance Criteria: eMASS structure validator passes

Title: Add CI end to end suite
Description: Run import build apply-sim verify export in CI on fixture corpus
Acceptance Criteria: E2E suite passes consistently in CI

Title: Build project dashboard and review workflow
Description: Implement UI for project creation import and rule triage
Acceptance Criteria: Users complete import and review in UI without CLI

Title: Build plan dry-run apply UX
Description: Implement status driven workflow for planning dry run and apply
Acceptance Criteria: Workflow supports resumable progress states

Title: Integrate manual check wizard
Description: Implement manual answer flow and backend persistence integration
Acceptance Criteria: Manual answers persist and flow into exports

Title: Build evidence workflow UI
Description: Implement evidence linking and review views by control identity
Acceptance Criteria: Evidence links are visible and exportable

Title: Implement input file process hardening
Description: Apply security controls for input validation and process execution boundaries
Acceptance Criteria: Critical hardening checklist items are implemented

Title: Enable dependency and supply chain scanning
Description: Add CI security scans and fail builds on critical findings
Acceptance Criteria: Critical vulnerability findings block merge

Title: Complete auditable event trail
Description: Record who what when why for major workflow operations
Acceptance Criteria: Audit events are complete and queryable

Title: Add rollback and destructive action guards
Description: Enforce safety rails and rollback options for risky operations
Acceptance Criteria: Rollback flow validated for failure scenarios

Title: Run soak tests on mixed corpora
Description: Execute long running stability tests on large multi-format datasets
Acceptance Criteria: Soak tests meet defined reliability threshold

Title: Build quarterly update regression pack
Description: Create compatibility regression suite and mapping drift alerting
Acceptance Criteria: Quarterly regression report generated with drift flags

Title: Prepare release and upgrade docs
Description: Create release checklist and migration playbook documentation
Acceptance Criteria: Release package and upgrade docs complete

Title: Complete GA sign off review
Description: Run final quality security ops sign-off and publish decision
Acceptance Criteria: All gate owners approve GA checklist

Title: Select canonical answerfile format
Description: Choose one answerfile source of truth for testing and docs
Acceptance Criteria: Canonical answerfile decision documented

Title: Align templates and README examples
Description: Update templates and examples to match canonical answerfile format
Acceptance Criteria: No mismatch across template locations and README examples

Title: Add answerfile schema validation in CI
Description: Validate answerfile fixtures against canonical schema during CI
Acceptance Criteria: CI fails on answerfile schema mismatch
